4309800.name: Bweh
4309800.description:
This is a very casual type of game, something to play on the side while you're listening to a lecture or watching a video, or when you're hanging out with friends.

It's a top-down turn-based shooter. This works because of a momentum mechanic that forces players to think a couple of moves ahead. 

Mechanics:

  • Primarily point-and-click based (though keyboard is needed)

  • Turn based

  • Free-for-all, PvP or PvE

  • Players are shot when one moves to the same row or column

  • Players have momentum in the last moved direction

  • River which removes momentum, adding complexity

  • Obstacles cannot be moved or shot through

  • Randomly generated map of chosen size, characters placed on map by player

  • Bots can be placed alongside players, allowing singleplayer gameplay

  • Audioless, intended as a secondary activity

  • Completely local, ie multiplayer is local, occuring in one instance on one machine

Additional features

  • Option for instant respawn (rather than new round)

  • Option for hiding map behind obstacles (continuous or discrete, using tiles)

  • Option for "toroidal mode", allowing crossing of the edge of the map and appearing on opposite edge

  • Option for removing river
